title: hmcl以及bakaxl二款启动器都无法启动1.7.10版本
author: 旧梦前尘
txt_content:
问题如上：1.7.10版本无法运行
bakaxl提示为：
Exception in thread "main" com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException: com.google.gson.stream.MalformedJsonException: Unterminated object at line 1 column 28
        at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:818)
        at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:768)
        at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:717)

Caused by: com.google.gson.stream.MalformedJsonException: Unterminated object at line 1 column 28

        ... 3 more
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
hmcl提示为：
Command: "C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre1.8.0_211\\bin\\java.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=C:\Users\jiumengqiancheng\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\1.7.10\1.7.10.jar -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions replies.author: Back_Wheel
replies.txt_content: 试试给客户端的内存加到2G或以上？MOD端可能需要4G或以上

replies.author: 旧梦前尘
replies.txt_content:
Back_Wheel 发表于 2019-4-17 20:52
试试给客户端的内存加到2G或以上？MOD端可能需要4G或以上
解决了，文件丢失，换了启动器就好了

replies.author: Daiyangcheng
replies.txt_content: 或许可以去官网下个新的 https://hmcl.huangyuhui.net/
